description: React component implementing a calculator with UI, logic, and keyboard support, including utility functions for number formatting, arithmetic operations, and state management.

methods.name: roundToPrecision
methods.description: Rounds a number to a fixed decimal precision to avoid floating point artifacts.

methods.name: formatResult
methods.description: Formats a number or string by trimming trailing zeros and decimal point if unnecessary.

methods.name: performOperation
methods.description: Performs basic arithmetic operations; returns 'Error' on divide by zero.

methods.name: isError
methods.description: Checks if the input string indicates an error state.

methods.name: mapKeyToOperator
methods.description: Maps keyboard keys to calculator operator symbols.
